description.value: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body. Your DC on flat checks to end @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is reduced from 15 to @Check[type:flat|dc:10]{10}, or from 10 to @Check[type:flat|dc:5]{5} after receiving especially appropriate assistance.
